#Removes the "Game won't be able to generate fallen empires" error
fallen_error_remove_initializer = {
	class = rl_standard_stars
	usage = fallen_empire_init
}

# Galactic Center
canon_huge_galactic_center_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Galactic_Center"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	flags = {
		galactic_center_system
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galactic_Center_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = 50
		init_effect = {
			clear_deposits = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_global_flag = huge_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = big_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = huge_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = star_wars_new_dawn
			save_global_event_target_as = gcenter
		}
	}
}

# Galactic Center
sandbox_huge_galactic_center_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Galactic_Center"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	flags = {
		galactic_center_system
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galactic_Center_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = 50
		init_effect = {
			clear_deposits = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_global_flag = huge_non_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = big_non_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = non_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = huge_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = star_wars_new_dawn
			save_global_event_target_as = gcenter
		}
	}
}

# Galactic Center, Large
canon_big_galactic_center_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Galactic_Center"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	flags = {
		galactic_center_system
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galactic_Center_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = 50
		init_effect = {
			clear_deposits = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_global_flag = large_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = big_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = large_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = star_wars_new_dawn
			save_global_event_target_as = gcenter
		}
	}
}

# Galactic Center
canon_small_galactic_center_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Galactic_Center"
	class = "sc_black_hole"

		galactic_center_system
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galactic_Center_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = 50
		init_effect = {
			clear_deposits = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_global_flag = small_canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = canon_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = small_map_spawned
			set_global_flag = star_wars_new_dawn
			save_global_event_target_as = gcenter
		}
	}

			set_global_flag = small_map_spawned

		}
	}

#Essesia
essesia_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Essesia"
	class = "sc_a"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P2"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = 20		#smaller than average
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P2_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = yes
		init_effect = {
			set_moraine_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_esseles
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			add_deposit = d_fertile_lands
			add_deposit = d_fort_cravus
			add_deposit = d_calamar
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P4_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P4_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P5_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P6"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = 20		#smaller than average
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Essesia_P6_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P7"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

			name = "NAME_Essesia_P7_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Essesia_P8"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

	}

#Rhinnal
rhinnal_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Rhinnal"
	class = "sc_b"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P2"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P3"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P4"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_rhinnal
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_deposit = d_rhinnal_med_academy
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = cascadian_planet_01_entity
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P4_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P6"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P6_2"

			}

				min = 90

			}

			}

				min = 90

			}

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P7"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25

			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P7_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "NAME_Rhinnal_P7_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}

				min = 90

			}

#Ralltiir
ralltiir_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ralltiir"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ralltiir_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ralltiir_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = @medium_planet_max_size

			set_planet_flag = planet_ralltiir

		commerce_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shulstine_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

			max = 15

			max = 270

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}

		}

sermeria_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sermeria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		taanab_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sermeria_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sermeria_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_fertile_lands
			add_deposit = d_black_soil
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Carcel
carcel_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Carcel"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		taanab_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Carcel_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Carcel_P1"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Pirin
pirin_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Pirin"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		taanab_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pirin_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pirin_P1"
		class = pc_alpine
		init_effect = { set_snow_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Gizer
gizer_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Gizer"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		taanab_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gizer_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes gizer ale
		name = "NAME_Gizer_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_highland_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Rearqu Cluster
rearqu_cluster_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Rearqu_Cluster"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rearqu_Cluster_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Jeyell
jeyell_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Jeyell"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		verpine_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jeyell_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jeyell_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_swamp_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Orleon
orleon_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Orleon"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Orleon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes never stopping rain
		name = "NAME_Orleon_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_swamp_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			}

			}

		class = pc_arid
		init_effect = { set_mesa_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90

			}

				min = 90

		}

		name = "NAME_Abhean_P1"

# Antemeridias
antemeridias_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Antemeridias"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Antemeridias_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Antemeridias_P1"
		class = pc_arctic
		init_effect = { set_frigid_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Antemeridias_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Antemeridias_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Antemeridias_P1_3"
			class = pc_tropical
			init_effect = { set_forest_world = yes }
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 30
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Columex
columex_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Columex"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Columex_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Columex_P1"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size
			max = @ecumenopolis_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_columex
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 20
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			max = 10

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		}

				min = 0
				max = 1

				max = 5

#Janodral Mizar

	name = "NAME_Jahodral_Mizar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		tion_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jahodral_Mizar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	change_orbit = 130
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 6
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 70
			max = 120
		}
	}
	change_orbit = 110
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 6
		}
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 70
			max = 120
		}
	}
	change_orbit = -210
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jahodral_Mizar_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		init_effect = { set_effusive_world = yes }
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		orbit_distance = 70
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Kailor
kailor_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kailor"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kailor_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailor_P5"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_monsoon_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			max = 1
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			min = 40

			max = @small_planet_max_size

			min = 0
			max = 1
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

		}

			}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {

			max = 270
		}
	}

		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

		}

		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 40
			max = 180

			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 180
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Perma_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lolnar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			max = 180

# Nubus
nubus_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Nubus"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_P2"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_P3"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_mineral_world = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			set_planet_flag = planet_nubia
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_deposit = d_nubia_star_drives
			add_deposit = d_automata_galactica
			add_deposit = d_tallera_downs
			add_deposit = d_regional_materials
			add_deposit = d_local_power_source
			add_deposit = d_abandoned_hydroponic
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P4_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nubus_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Nubus_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Biblos_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Biblos_P5_1"

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2

			}

				min = 90

			}

				min = 90

		}

		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_moraine_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pencael_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

iseno_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Iseno"
	class = "sc_g"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Iseno_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Iseno_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = high_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Osarian
osarian_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Osarian"
	class = "sc_f"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Osarian_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Osarian_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Osarian_P2"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Osarian_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Osarian_P3"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_planet_flag = planet_rhommamool
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}

			name = "NAME_Osarian_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Osarian_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Osarian_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}

#Tlactehon
tlactehon_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tlactehon"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		tiyanki_home_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
		create_tiyanki_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant
			}
			save_event_target_as = giant
			event_target:tiyanki_country = {
				save_event_target_as = tiyanki_country2
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_1 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_2 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_3 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_4 = yes
					}
					10 = {
						create_tiyanki_fleet_5 = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tlactehon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tlactehon_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		init_effect = { set_dune_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = 90

		}

				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			class = random_non_colonizable

			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4

		}

		}

			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

#Mon Gazza
mon_gazza_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		cis_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P2"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_dust_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P2_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P3"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P3_4"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mon_Gazza_P3_5"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270

#Smuggler's Run
smugglers_run_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Smugglers_Run"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		ryloth_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Smugglers_Run_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Smugglers_Run_P1"
		class = pc_polis_massa
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 10
		size = {
			min = @asteroid_base_min_size
			max = @asteroid_base_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# New Plympto
new_plympto_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_New_Plympto"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_New_Plympto_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_New_Plympto_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

		name = "NAME_New_Plympto_P3"

		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size

			size = {

		}

		}

			max = 3

				max = 5
			}

			orbit_angle = {

			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

kinyen_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kinyen"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		koorivar_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_kinyen
			set_prairie_world = yes
			add_deposit = d_fertile_lands
			add_modifier = { modifier = natural_beauty }
			create_gran_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:gran_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Gran_Territory"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal
					civic = civic_mining_guilds
				}
				authority = auth_imperial
				species = event_target:gran_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = gran_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Kinyen_P3" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kinyen_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 7
				max = 10
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kinyen_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 7
				max = 10
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kinyen_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 7
				max = 10
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kinyen_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kinyen_P5_2"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2

		}
		moon = {

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kinyen_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Pendari"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		koorivar_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Pendari_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			max = 270
		}

			max = @medium_planet_max_size

	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

		}

			max = 35

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

			max = 4
		}

			max = 25
		}

			min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			max = 270
		}

		}

		}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 5

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90

#Kaal
kaal_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kaal"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kaal_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kaal_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_deposit = d_tropical_island
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		}

			max = 35
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

			set_steppe_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		name = "NAME_Jiroch_P5"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_monsoon_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jiroch_P6"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		count = {

			max = 6
		}

# Aztubek
aztubek_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Aztubek"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = huge_map_spawned }
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aztubek_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 2
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

# Indellian
indellian_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Indellian"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Indellian_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Indellian_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = low_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		canon_map
	}

		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Zhanox_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5

			}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

				max = 5

			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Darlyn_Boda_P1"

		}

			max = 15

	}

		class = random_non_colonizable

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {

				max = 4
			}
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}

			add_deposit = d_bubbling_swamp
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

			name = "NAME_Darlyn_Boda_P5_1"

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

orn_kios_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Orn_Kios"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Orn_Kios_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Orn_Kios_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_megaflora_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Berrols_Donn_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Sil_Lume_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sil_Lume_P1"
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

			min = 1
			max = 2
		}

			min = 40
			max = 180

		arkanian_start_system
		canon_map
	}

			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Drearia_S"

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			max = 1
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 1

				max = 5

#Bogden
bogden_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Bogden"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = small_map_spawned }
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_hydian_way
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bogden_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	# planet = {
	# 	name = "NAME_Bogden_P1"
	# 	class = pc_molten
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 15
	# 	}
	# 	has_ring = no
	# }
	# planet = {
	# 	name = "NAME_Bogden_P2"
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 15
	# 	}
	# 	has_ring = no
	# }
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bogden_P3"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_tidallylocked_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_bogden
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = unstable_tectonics
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_1"
			class = pc_tropical
			init_effect = { 
				set_bog_world = yes
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = 180
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 45
				max = 135
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_4"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = 180
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_5"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 45
				max = 135
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_6"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = 180
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_7"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 45
				max = 135
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bogden_P3_8"
			class = pc_arid
			init_effect = { 
				set_highland_world = yes
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4

			orbit_angle = {

				max = 270
			}

#Draria
draria_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Draria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Draria_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

		}
	}

		}

			max = 10

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = darksaber_clue

				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			max = 270
		}
	}

#Bandomeer
bandomeer_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Bandomeer"
	class = "sc_k"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bandomeer_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P1"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P1_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P2"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_bandomeer
			set_planet_flag = darksaber_clue
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			create_meerian_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:meerian_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Meerian_Territory"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_agrarian_idyll
					civic = civic_mining_guilds
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:meerian_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_pacifist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = meerian_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P2" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P3"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Bandomeer_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Harloen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35

#Botajef
botajef_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Botajef"
	class = "sc_m_giant"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Botajef_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Botajef_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Botajef_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Botajef_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Botajef_P3"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_botajef
			set_planet_flag = darksaber_clue
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			create_jefi_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:jefi_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Jefi_Authority"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_meritocracy
					civic = civic_technocracy
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:jefi_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
				}
				#ethic = "ethic_militarist" 
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_03
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = jefi_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Botajef_P3" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Botajef_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Botajef_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Botajef_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Botajef_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Botajef_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

#Listehol
listehol_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Listehol"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_listehol
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Listehol_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			max = 10

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

		}

			min = 90

		}

			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

#Mall'ordian
mall_ordian_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mall_Ordian"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		csa_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mall_Ordian_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mall_Ordian_P1"
		class = pc_alpine
		init_effect = { 
			set_mineral_world = yes 
			add_deposit = d_regional_materials
			add_deposit = d_local_power_source
			add_deposit = d_abandoned_hydroponic
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Lythos
lythos_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Lythos"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		csa_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lythos_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lythos_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_tidallylocked_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = tidal_locked
			}
			add_deposit = d_minerals_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lythos_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
