#D'ian
d_ian_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_D_Ian"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		csa_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_D_Ian_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes Orchid vines
		name = "NAME_D_Ian_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_prairie_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Southern Hydian Way

#Skako
skako_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Skako"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_P2"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_P3"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			save_global_event_target_as = planet_skako
			create_skakoan_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:skakoan_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Skakoan_Authority"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_byzantine_bureaucracy
					civic = civic_atmospheric_pollution
				}
				authority = auth_oligarchic
				species = event_target:skakoan_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_xenophobe"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = skakoan_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Skako_P3" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P3_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_P4"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Skako_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Skako_P5_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

			max = 3
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

# Sarapin
sarapin_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sarapin"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sarapin_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sarapin_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_infernal_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sarapin_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sarapin_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Trellen"

	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Trellen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#minor
		name = "NAME_Trellen_P1"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size
			max = @ecumenopolis_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Mawan
mawan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mawan"
	class = "sc_desev"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mawan_S1"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mawan_S2"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 20
			max = 25
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mawan_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_mawan
			set_mushroom_world = yes
			create_mawan_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:mawan_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Mawan_Authority"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_shadow_council
					civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:mawan_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = mawan_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Mawan_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mawan_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Loretto_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		}

				max = 5

			max = 35
		}

		name = "NAME_Denon_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {

			max = 15

#Sagar
sagar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sagar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sagar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sagar_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

chardaan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Chardaan"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chardaan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chardaan_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_tidallylocked_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}

#Baroli
baroli_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Baroli"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		naboo_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Baroli_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Baroli_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_baroli
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			entity = "swp_barren_planet_02_entity"
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			entity = "swp_toxic_planet_02_entity"
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_4"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			entity = "swp_toxic_planet_01_entity"
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Baroli_P1_6"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

#Gacerian
gacerian_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Gacerian"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		naboo_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_P1"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_P2"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_poor }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gacerian_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_P4"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_effusive_world = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gacerian_P4_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gacerian_P4_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gacerian_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gacerian_P5_1"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40

			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}

			name = "NAME_Gacerian_P5_2"

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

	name = "NAME_Ramordia"

		naboo_sector_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ramordia_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ramordia_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_megaflora_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

#Chryya
chryya_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Chryya"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chryya_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chryya_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

rutan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Rutan"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		terminus_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_hydian_way
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rutan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rutan_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		init_effect = { set_veld_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rutan_P1_1"
			class = pc_ocean
			orbit_distance = 10
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			moon = {
				name = "NAME_Rutan_P1_1_1"
				class = pc_barren
				orbit_distance = 6
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
			moon = {
				name = "NAME_Rutan_P1_1_2"

				orbit_distance = 2
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
			moon = {
				name = "NAME_Rutan_P1_1_3"
				class = pc_barren_cold
				orbit_distance = 2
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
			moon = {
				name = "NAME_Rutan_P1_1_4"
				class = pc_barren
				orbit_distance = 2
				orbit_angle = {
					min = 90
					max = 270
				}
				size = {
					min = 2
					max = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {

#Rimma Trade Route + B-Route

#Abregado-rae
abregado_rae_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae"
	class = "sc_m"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P2"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_abregado_rae
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P4_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Abregado_Rae_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Giju
giju_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Giju"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Giju_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Giju_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_giju
			set_atoll_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Ghorman"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {

		}
	}

			max = 35
		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = @medium_planet_max_size

			}

			max = 25

			min = 90

		}

		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Polith_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Polith_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Polith_P2_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Polith_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_thyferra
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			add_deposit = d_bacta_materials_2
			add_deposit = d_bacta_processing
			create_vratix_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:vratix_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Vratix_Republic"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_idealistic_foundation
					civic = civic_environmentalist
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:vratix_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = vratix_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Polith_P3" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Polith_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Polith_P3_2"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Polith_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {

#Tauber
tauber_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tauber"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tauber_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tauber_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_flooded_mounds
			add_deposit = d_savage_wildlands
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Wroona
wroona_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Wroona"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Wroona_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Wroona_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_wroona
			create_wroonian_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:wroonian_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Wroona_Port_Authority"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_meritocracy
					civic = civic_technocracy
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:wroonian_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
				}
				#ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = wroona_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Wroona_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {

	name = "NAME_Tregillis"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tregillis_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

#Vandelhelm
vandelhelm_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Vandelhelm"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_vandelhelm
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Vandelhelm_P1_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

#Daemen
daemen_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Daemen"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Daemen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Daemen_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Alakatha
alakatha_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_K_Vath"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5_3"
			class = pc_tropical
			orbit_distance = 2
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P5_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 2
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_K_Vath_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_K_Vath_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Lanthe
lanthe_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Lanthe"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lanthe_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lanthe_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Vondarc
vondarc_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Vondarc"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vondarc_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vondarc_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Medth
medth_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Medth"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Medth_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Medth_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Tshindral
tshindral_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tshindral"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P3"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tshindral_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tshindral_P3_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tshindral_P3_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tshindral_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Triton
triton_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Triton"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
		starport_start
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Triton_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Triton_P1"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Triton_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Triton_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Triton_P1_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
}

#Praesitlyn
praesitlyn_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Praesitlyn"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Praesitlyn_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Praesitlyn_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_planet_flag = planet_praesitlyn
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

#Kaikielius
kaikielius_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kailielius"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailielius_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailielius_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailielius_P2"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kailielius_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kailielius_P2_2"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kailielius_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {

			max = 30
		}

			}

		}

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			}

			}

#Ruan
ruan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ruan"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ruan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ruan_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ruan_P2"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ruan_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_prairie_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ruan_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ruan_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ruan_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		}
	}

		}

	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Keeara_Major_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 0
	# 		max = 1
	# 	}

	# 		min = 5

	# 	}

	# 	}

	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}

	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Keeara_Major_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {

		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Prakith_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Prakith_P1"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		}

			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Beshqek_P8_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Beshqek_P8_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# Deep Core

#Spira
spira_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Spira"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Spira_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Spira_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 30
			max = 60
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Vulpter
vulpter_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Vulpter"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_P2"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Vulpter_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_vulpter
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			create_vulptereen_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:vulptereen_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Vulpter_Port_Authority"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_technocracy
					civic = civic_mining_guilds
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:vulptereen_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = vulptereen_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Vulpter_P3" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_P4"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulpter_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

#Tython
tython_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tython"
	class = "sc_k"
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_tython
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_koros_trunk_line
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tython_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tython_P1"

			min = 90

			max = 15

	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Treskov_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	# planet = {
	# 	name = "NAME_Treskov_P1"
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable

	# 	}

	# 	}

	# 			max = 4
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	moon = {
	# 		name = "NAME_Treskov_P2_2"
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		size = {

	# 			max = 4
	# 		}
	# 	}

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Treskov_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Treskov_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			}

		moon = {
			#map-notes bronzium
			name = "NAME_Treskov_P4_9"
			class = pc_desert
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
				set_dune_world = yes
				add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {

#Hakassi
hakassi_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Hakassi"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hakassi_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hakassi_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Ojom
ojom_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ojom"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ojom_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ojom_P1"
		class = pc_arctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_glacial_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3 # will change if Besalisk pre ftls are added
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Eclipse
eclipse_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Eclipse"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Eclipse_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 130
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Eclipse_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 170
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = crystal_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 270
	}
}

#Kalist
kalist_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kalist"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kalist_P6"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_oasis_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = bleak_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kalist_P6_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kalist_P6_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

#Zamael
zamael_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Zamael"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zamael_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Constancia
constancia_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Constancia"
	class = "sc_k"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Constancia_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Constancia_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

		}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Khomm_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		canon_map

		}
	}

		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

			}

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

#Panto
panto_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Panto"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Panto_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Panto_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_atoll_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Panto_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Panto_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Panto_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Panto_P2"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 15
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Panto_P3"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = { 
			set_snow_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Panto_P4"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Pyria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		}
	}
