		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P2"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P3"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P4"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_borleias
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_poor }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pyria_P4_1"
			class = pc_molten
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pyria_P6"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pyria_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pyria_P6_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pyria_P6_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pyria_P6_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90

				max = 5

			}

				min = 90

	# 	class = pc_toxic

	# 		}

	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 4
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ansion_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_prairie_world = yes
			add_deposit = d_geothermal_vent
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_ansion
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = low_gravity
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ansion_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ansion_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

#Namadii
namadii_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Namadii"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Namadii_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Norkronia
norkronia_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Norkronia"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Norkronia_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Norkronia_P1"
		class = pc_arctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Alland
alland_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Alland"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Alland_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Alland_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Cal-Seti
cal_seti_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Cal_Seti"
	class = "sc_g"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_cal_seti
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cal_Seti_P4_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

utos_system_initializer = {

	class = "sc_k"

			modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
		}

	}

		name = "NAME_Utos_S"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

		name = "NAME_Utos_P1"

		}

			min = 90

				modifier = unstable_tectonics

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

#Fre'ji
freji_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Fre_Ji"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_metellos_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P2"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_reef_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
			set_planet_flag = planet_fresia
			add_deposit = d_incom_corporation
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_1
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P2_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P2_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P3"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P4"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Fre_Ji_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

#Galand
galand_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Galand"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galand_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Galand_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

	}

			max = 35
		}

			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_tropical

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @big_planet_min_size
			max = @big_planet_max_size
		}

			set_megaflora_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		}

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size

			set_supercontinental_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

				max = 5

			orbit_angle = {

#Zug
zug_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Zug"
	class = "sc_k"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_corellian_run
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zug_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zug_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zug_P2"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zug_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_aargau
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "NAME_Zug_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2
				max = 4

			name = "NAME_Zug_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zug_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30

#Broest
broest_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Broest"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Broest_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Broest_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		init_effect = { set_veld_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Atzerri
atzerri_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Atzerri"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_hydian_way
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_swamp_world = yes
		 }
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Atzerri_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Atzerri_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 190
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Atzerri_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Atzerri_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Atzerri_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Atzerri_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

		}
		moon = {

#Tynna
tynna_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tynna"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tynna_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tynna_P1"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_snow_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_tynna
			create_tynnan_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:tynnan_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Tynnan_Central_Government"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_parliamentary_system
					civic = civic_meritocracy
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:tynnan_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = tynnan_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Tynna_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Illodia_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		class = star

		size = {

		}

		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}

	}

			max = 1
		}

			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

# Ganthel
ganthel_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ganthel"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ganthel_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ganthel_P1"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size
			max = @ecumenopolis_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = { 
			set_planet_flag = ganthel_homeworld
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

tepasi_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tepasi"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tepasi_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		#map-notes Achtnak, Earthquakes

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_forest_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_tepasi
			set_planet_flag = tepasi_homeworld
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

		}

#Caamas
caamas_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Caamas"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		alderaan_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Caamas_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Caamas_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Caamas_P2"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_caamas
			create_caamasi_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:caamasi_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Caamasi_Territory"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_parliamentary_system
					civic = civic_free_haven
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:caamasi_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = caamasi_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Caamas_P2" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Caamas_P3"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Caamas_P3_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Caamas_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Caamas_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Caamas_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Caamas_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Caamas_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kattada_P1"
		class = pc_desert

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90

		}

				max = 5

		# 	}

		# 	orbit_angle = 90

			min = 90
			max = 270

#Voon
voon_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Voon"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Voon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Voon_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}

			min = 2

		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

	}

			max = 35
		}

		radius = 30
	}

# Velus
velus_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Velus"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Velus_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Velus_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Velus_P2"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_atoll_world = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_velusia
			create_aquar_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:aquar_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Aquar_Polity"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_mining_guilds
					civic = civic_efficient_bureaucracy
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:aquar_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = aquar_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Velus_P2" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Velus_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4

#Farrfin
farrfin_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Farrfin"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Farrfin_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Farrfin_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}

	# 		}

			max = 35
		}
	}

			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shawken_P2"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shawken_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 25
			max = 30

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Basilisk_P1"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {

				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			orbit_distance = 2

# Vultar

	name = "NAME_Vultar"
	class = "sc_m"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vultar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 20
			max = 25
		}
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 60
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vultar_P1"
		class = pc_shattered
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 60
			max = 120
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = yes
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 120
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 220
	}
}

#Balmorra
balmorra_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Balmorra"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_balmorra
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			# clear_planet_modifiers = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P1_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_P2"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_monsoon_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balmorra_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balmorra_P5_2"

			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}

# Pria
pria_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Pria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pria_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pria_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = unstable_tectonics
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pria_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

	# 		max = 270
	# 	}

				min = 90

			}

				min = 2

			}

				min = 90

			}

# Phemis
phemis_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Phemis"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Phemis_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Phemis_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_mesa_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_phemis
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			set_deposit = d_kyber_vein
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}

	# 	moon = {

	# 			min = 0

	# 		}

# Goorla
goorla_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Goorla"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Goorla_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Aurea
aurea_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Aurea"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aurea_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aurea_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}


#Sacorria
sacorria_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sacorria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P2"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P3"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			set_prairie_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_sacorria
			add_deposit = d_sacorria_central_spaceport
			add_deposit = d_dorthus_tal_city
			add_deposit = d_sacorrian_triad
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P5_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P6"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P6_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P6_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sacorria_P6_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sacorria_P7"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

#Karvoss
karvoss_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Karvoss"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @moon_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Karvoss_P7"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Hemei
hemei_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Hemei"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P4"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_hemei_iv
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P7"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P8"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hemei_P9"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

#Shumogi
shumogi_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Shumogi"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shumogi_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shumogi_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Chamm
chamm_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Chamm"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chamm_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Chamm_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Danteel
danteel_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Danteel"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		corellian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Danteel_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Danteel_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

#Balosar
balosar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Balosar"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_P3"
		class = pc_nuked
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_balosar
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = pm_polluted
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P4_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P4_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Balosar_P5"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Balosar_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4

		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no

				min = 0
				max = 1

			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

#Plexis
plexis_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Plexis"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Plexis_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Plexis_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 2
	# 		max = 6
	# 	}
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90

	# 		}

		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			max = 15

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = @medium_planet_max_size

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Steelious_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}
	}

# Jinata

	class = "sc_g"

		republic_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_namadii_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jinata_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jinata_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_forest_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jinata_P2"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_moraine_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jinata_P3"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			set_reef_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = cascadian_planet_01_entity
		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
	}
}

		canon_map
	}

		}

#Devaron
devaron_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Devaron"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		fondor_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Devaron_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Devaron_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Devaron_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Devaron_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_devaron
			create_devaronian_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:devaronian_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Devaronian_Participate"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_shadow_council
					civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:devaronian_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = devaronian_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Devaron_P1_2" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Obroa-skai
obroa_skai_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_perlemian_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P3"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P3_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P3_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 90
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Obroa_Skai_P4"
		class = pc_arctic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_obroa_skai
		}
		entity = "contintental_obroa_skai_planet_01_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		#map-notes Borium
		name = "NAME_Contruum_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

			name = "NAME_Contruum_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Contruum_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {

			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

# Kluistar
kluistar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kluistar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		arkanian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kluistar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kluistar_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_forest_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = natural_beauty
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = dangerous_wildlife
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Phindar
phindar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Phindar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = phindar_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Phindar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Phindar_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_phindar
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

#Gala
gala_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Gala"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gala_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gala_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gala_P1_1"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gala_P1_2"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gala_P1_3"
			class = pc_frozen
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_monsoon_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_gala
			set_planet_flag = darksaber_clue
			# create_galacian_species = yes
			# generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:galacian_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			# create_country = {
			# 	name = "NAME_Galan_Republic"
			# 	civics = {
			# 		civic = civic_parliamentary_system
			# 		civic = civic_byzantine_bureaucracy
			# 	}

#Vjun

		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_salin_corridor
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = vjun_system
	}

		class = star

		orbit_angle = 1

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

#Lucazec
