# Kubindi / Ku'Bakai
kubindi_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kubindi"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kubindi_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kubindi_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_dust_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wasteland_radiation
			}
			create_kubaz_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:kubaz_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = { 
				name = "NAME_Kubaz_Kingdom"
				civics = { 
					civic = civic_environmentalist
					civic = civic_functional_architecture
				}
				authority = auth_imperial
				species = event_target:kubaz_species
				ethos = { 
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_militarist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = { 
				set_graphical_culture = misc_03
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = kubaz_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Kubindi_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kubindi_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kubindi_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kubindi_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kubindi_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kubindi_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kubindi_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Eadu"

			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}

		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Eadu_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_highland_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

# Bheriz
bheriz_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Bheriz"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bheriz_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Bheriz_P1"
		class = pc_tundra
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Aduba
aduba_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Aduba"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aduba_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aduba_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aduba_P2"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4

# Teth
teth_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Teth"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P2"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P2_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P2_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_jungle_world = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_teth
			#set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
			add_deposit = d_teth_palace
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P4"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Teth_P6"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Teth_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

				min = 90

			}

				min = 2

# Glottal
glottal_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Glottal"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Glottal_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Glottal_P1"
		class = pc_tropical

		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Dilbana_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
}

			min = 10

		name = "NAME_Clantaano_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Clantaano_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Clantaano_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Clantaano_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Clantaano_P6"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Barab
barab_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Barab"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Barab_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Barab_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_karst_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = irradiated_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Barab_P2"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Barab_P3"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Barab_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Barab_P3_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

# Dubrava
dubrava_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Dubrava"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dubrava_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dubrava_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }

# Syvris
syvris_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Syvris"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Syvris_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Syvris_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Syvris_P2"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Syvris_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Syvris_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Syvris_P2_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Syvris_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Syvris_P3_1"
			class = pc_arid
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			init_effect = { 
				set_mesa_world = yes
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Syvris_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Arami"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Arami_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

			set_frigid_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no

	}

	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}

	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			min = 90
			max = 270

			min = @medium_planet_min_size

	name = "NAME_A_Foroon"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_A_Foroon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}

# Ooo-temiuk
ooo_temiuk_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ooo_Temiuk"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ooo_Temiuk_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ooo_Temiuk_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_forest_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

# Tatooine
tatoo_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tatoo"
	class = "sc_tatooine"
	flags = {
		star_system_tatoo
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_S1"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 10
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 0
			max = 360
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_S2"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = 180
		size = 15
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_dune_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = vader_homeworld
			set_planet_flag = planet_tatooine
			add_deposit = d_mos_espa
			add_deposit = d_mos_eisley
			add_deposit = d_jabbas_palace
			add_deposit = d_beggars_canyon
			add_deposit = d_great_chott_salt_flat
			add_deposit = d_great_pit_of_carkoon
			add_deposit = d_mochot_steep
			set_planet_entity = { entity = desert_planet_06_entity }
			create_bomarr_monk_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:bomarr_monk_species" AMOUNT = 6 }
			create_jawa_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:jawa_species" AMOUNT = 4 }
			save_global_event_target_as = planet_tatooine
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P1_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 200
	}
	change_orbit = 50
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_P2_1"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_P2_2"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_P3"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tatoo_P3_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tatoo_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes

			}
			size = {
				min = 2

	# 		}

# Llanic
llanic_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Llanic"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		cis_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Llanic_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6

			max = 30

		}

# Ando
ando_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ando"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ando_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ando_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ando_P2"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_ando
			create_aqualish_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:aqualish_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Ando_Polity"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_mining_guilds
					civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
				}
				authority = auth_oligarchic
				species = event_target:aqualish_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = aqualish_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Ando_P2" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ando_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ando_P2_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ando_P3"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ando_P4"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 4
			max = 4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		bothan_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		name = "NAME_Torolis_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

				max = 5

		size = {

		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5

#Kamino
kamino_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kamino"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kamino_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kamino_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			event_target:pirate_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Pirate_Fleet"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Skull"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Corsair"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Black_Earl"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 1
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_pirate_invincible"
								graphical_culture = "misc_01"
							}
						}
						set_location = prevprev
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kamino_P2"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kamino_P3"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kamino_P4"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kamino_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kamino_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable

# Austan
austan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Austan"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		rodian_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Austan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 175
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Scarif
scarif_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Scarif"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Scarif_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = large_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Scarif_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			add_modifier = { modifier = natural_beauty }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Nar Kaaga
nar_kaaga_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Nar_Kaaga"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nar_Kaaga_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nar_Kaaga_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_nar_kaaga
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Carnovia_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Hollastin
hollastin_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Hollastin"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P6"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hollastin_P7"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5

# Far Pando
far_pando_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Far_Pando"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Far_Pando_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Far_Pando_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

aylayl_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Aylayl"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Aylayl_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_forest_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {

	# 	}

# Diyu
diyu_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Diyu"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_shag_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Diyu_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Diyu_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Ylesia
ylesia_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Cha_Raaba"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_shag_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cha_Raaba_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cha_Raaba_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 70
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
			set_planet_flag = planet_ylesia
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cha_Raaba_P2"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit
			set_mesa_world = yes
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				max = 5

# Outland Transit
outland_transit_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Outland_Transit"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_shag_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Outland_Transit_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Outland_Transit_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Lirra
lirra_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Lirra"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_shag_pabol
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lirra_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lirra_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_swamp_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tol_Amn_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_deposit = d_hyperfertile_valley
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			max = 35

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 5
			}

		}

	}

			max = 4

			max = 270
		}
	}

# Varl/ Ardos
ardos_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ardos"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_shag_pabol
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 70
	}
	change_orbit = 70
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P1_1"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P1_2"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P1_3"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P1_4"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P2"
		class = pc_relic # change to wasteland at some point
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_wasteland_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ardos_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ardos_P2_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Ardos_P2_3"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 170
	}
	change_orbit = 50
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P3_1"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P3_2"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P3_3"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ardos_P3_4"
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
}

# M'Hanna
mhanna_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_M_Hanna"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_M_Hanna_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_M_Hanna_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = bleak_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Droxu_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Droxu_P1_4"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			has_ring = yes
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Droxu_P1_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

			max = 3
		}

			max = 10
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

# Moralan
moralan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Moralan"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Moralan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Moralan_P1"
		class = pc_nuked
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = irradiated_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Elgit"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Elgit_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Elgit_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

# Cyax
cyax_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Cyax"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_shag_pabol
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cyax_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Cyax_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cyax_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cyax_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cyax_P1_3"
			class = pc_tropical
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cyax_P1_4"
			class = swnd_random_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Cyax_P1_5"
			class = swnd_random_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 30
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

	# 	orbit_distance = 30

	# 		max = 270
	# 	}

pybus_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Pybus"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pybus_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pybus_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pybus_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pybus_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pybus_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_megaflora_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "NAME_Pybus_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pybus_P3_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pybus_P3_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Pybus_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pybus_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "NAME_Pybus_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Pybus_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}

			}

kor_usilic_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kor_Usilic"

		}

		count = {

		}

			min = 5

		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kor_Usilic_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

	}
	planet = {

			min = 3

# Mulatan
mulatan_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mulatan"
	class = "sc_b"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mulatan_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_P3"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 160
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 90
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mulatan_P4_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mulatan_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mulatan_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mulatan_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 90

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kor_Desilijis_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_bog_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

# Saki
saki_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Saki"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Saki_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Saki_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_sakiya
			save_global_event_target_as = planet_sakiya
			add_modifier = { modifier = high_gravity }
			create_sakiyan_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:sakiyan_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Sakiyan_Hegemony"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_imperial_cult
					civic = civic_functional_architecture
				}
				authority = auth_imperial
				species = event_target:sakiyan_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
					ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = hutt_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = sakiyan_faction
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
			last_created_country = {
				capital_scope = {
					set_name = "NAME_Saki_P1"
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Saki_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 4
				max = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

				max = 5

			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Boz_Pity_P2"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

			set_effusive_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_planet_flag = planet_boz_pity
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

		class = pc_tundra
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 115
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no

	planet = {

# Zerm
zerm_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Zerm"

		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zerm_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# The Maw
the_maw_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_The_Maw"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
		
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_kessel_run
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_leviathans = yes
			}
			set_star_flag = guardians_horror_system
			set_star_flag = guardian
			set_star_flag = hostile_system
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S1"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S2"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 15
			max = 20
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S3"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = {
			min = 30
			max = 30
		}
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S4"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = {
			min = 30
			max = 30
		}
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S5"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 15
			max = 20
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_The_Maw_S6"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Kessel
kessel_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kessel"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_kessel_run
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P2"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_kessel
				entity = arid_kessel_planet_01_entity
			}
			set_planet_flag = planet_kessel
			add_deposit = d_spice_deposit_2
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Kessel_P2_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 130
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P3_1"
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P3_2"
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P3_3"
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P3_4"
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 90
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kessel_P4"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

	}

		name = "NAME_Little_Kessel_S"

		size = {

			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_tropical

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_mushroom_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90

				modifier = high_gravity
			}
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4

	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Kafane
kafane_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kafane"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		hutt_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kafane_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kafane_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		canon_map
	}

		name = "NAME_Vodran_S"
		class = star

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist

		name = "NAME_Vodran_P1"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			min = 90

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90

				max = 5
