# Azzameen (Station)
azzameen_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Azzameen"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Azzameen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Azzameen_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			create_ambient_object = {
				type = "swnd_ambient_familybase"
				location = this
			}
			last_created_ambient_object = {
				set_location = {
					target = prev
					distance = 10
					angle = 30
				}
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}


# Omwat
omwat_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Omwat"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		sluis_sector_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Omwat_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Omwat_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_veld_world = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_omwat
			save_global_event_target_as = planet_omwat
			create_omwati_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:omwati_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Omwati_Junta"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_warrior_culture
					civic = civic_byzantine_bureaucracy
				}
				authority = auth_oligarchic
				species = event_target:omwati_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = omwati_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Omwat_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

		name = "NAME_Dravian_Station_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

trigalis_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Trigalis"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Trigalis_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Trigalis_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Stend
stend_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Stend"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P4"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_monsoon_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Stend_P6"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Stend_P6_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Stend_P6_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Stend_P6_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# Lybeya
lybeya_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Lybeya"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lybeya_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 55
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 105
	}

		class = pc_asteroid

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40

			min = 1

		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 155
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lybeya_P1"
		class = pc_polis_massa

			min = 40
			max = 180

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

	asteroid_belt = {
		type = icy_asteroid_belt
		radius = 225

		name = "NAME_Vohai_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Elshandruu Pica
elshandruu_pica_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
			entity = "swp_barren_planet_02_entity"
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Elshandruu_Pica_P1_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 200
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 25
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		class = pc_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

suarbi_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Suarbi"

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Suarbi_P1"

		}

			max = 15
		}

# Svivren
svivren_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Svivren"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Svivren_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Svivren_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_mediterranean_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_svivren
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Spice Terminus
spice_terminus_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Spice_Terminus"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Spice_Terminus_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Spice_Terminus_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

	}

		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}

		orbit_distance = 0

			min = 40
			max = 180

# Dagobah
dagobah_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Dagobah"
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = large_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_P2"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_dagobah
			add_deposit = d_bogs_of_dagobah
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Dagobah_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_P3"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Dagobah_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Dagobah_P3_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_P4"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dagobah_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "NAME_Dagobah_P5_1"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {

				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

				min = 2

			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Dagobah_P5_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

# Verdanth
verdanth_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Verdanth"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		cis_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = large_map_spawned
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Verdanth_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

		}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {

			max = 270
		}
	}

			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}

			min = 10
			max = 15

		radius = 215

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}

			min = 40
			max = 180
		}

# New Balosar
new_balosar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_New_Balosar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_New_Balosar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = { # colony needs to be moved to Balosar proper
		name = "NAME_New_Balosar_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			save_global_event_target_as = planet_balosar
			create_balosar_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:balosar_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_New_Balosar_Colony"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_free_haven
					civic = civic_cutthroat_politics
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:balosar_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = kiffar_faction
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
			last_created_country = {
				capital_scope = {
					set_name = "NAME_New_Balosar_P1"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		name = "NAME_Petabys_Station_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Petabys_Station_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Laakteen Depot
laakteen_depot_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Laakteen_Depot"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Laakteen_Depot_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_rimma_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Laakteen_Depot_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 5

	# 		min = 2

	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_highland_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = low_gravity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {

	name = "NAME_Tasar"
	class = "sc_a"

		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_tasar
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tasar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tasar_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_deposit = d_minerals_6
			add_deposit = d_alloys_2
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tasar_P2"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size

				max = 270

				min = 2

		}

				min = 0
				max = 1
			}

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

# Llon Nebulae
llon_nebulae_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Llon_Nebulae"
	class = "sc_nebula_red"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = amoeba_home_system
		create_amoeba_home_fleet_1 = yes
		create_amoeba_home_fleet_2 = yes
		create_amoeba_home_roaming_fleets = yes
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Llon_Nebulae_S"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_star
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_star
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Space_Amoebas_United"
				type = amoeba_garrison
				flag = {
					icon = {
						category = "zoological"
						file = "flag_zoological_1.dds"
					}
					background = {
						category = "backgrounds"
						file = "00_solid.dds"
					}
					colors = {
						"black"
						"black"
						"null"
						"null"
					}
				}
				effect = {
					save_global_event_target_as = amoeba_garrison_country
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = event_target:amoeba_country
						}
						set_faction_hostility = {
							set_hostile = no
							set_neutral = yes
							target = event_target:amoeba_country
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_ambient_object = {
				type = "space_storm_1"
				location = this
			}
			last_created_ambient_object = {
				set_location = {
					target = prev
					distance = 5
					angle = 180
				}
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		class = pc_gas_giant
		size = 42
		orbit_distance = 150
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		has_ring = no
		flags = {
			amoeba_giant1
		}
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_giant
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 1
				max = 4
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 42
		orbit_angle = 45
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_1
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_1
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 133
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_2
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_2
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 107
		size = 5
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = amoeba_ice_asteroid_3
			set_planet_flag = amoeba_ice_asteroid_3
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
}

# Kiffu
kiffu_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kiffu"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kiffu_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kiffu_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_kiffu
			set_dust_world = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = wild_storms }
			create_kiffar_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:kiffar_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Kiffar_Sovereignty"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_idealistic_foundation
					civic = civic_environmentalist
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:kiffar_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_spiritualist"
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_pacifist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = kiffar_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Kiffu_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kiffu_P2"
		class = pc_arid
		init_effect = { set_mesa_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 6
		orbit_angle = 10
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

# Mijos
mijos_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mijos"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = huge_map_spawned
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mijos_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mijos_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_swamp_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Q'mara
qmara_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Q_Mara"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		juvex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Q_Mara_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

	}

			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}

				max = 5
			}

			max = 270
		}

# Velga
velga_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Velga"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		juvex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Velga_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Velga_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Velga_P1_1"
			class = swnd_random_colonizable
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Umthyg_P1"
		class = pc_ecumenopolis
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @ecumenopolis_min_size
			max = @ecumenopolis_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_umthyg
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

ogem_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Ogem"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Ogem_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}

	# 		min = 10

	# 	}
	# }

# Tarsa
tarsa_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tarsa"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tarsa_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tarsa_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_forest_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Vulcar
vulcar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Vulcar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		juvex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulcar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vulcar_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			set_lava_world = yes
			add_deposit = d_regional_materials
			add_deposit = d_local_power_source
			add_deposit = d_abandoned_hydroponic
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

			min = 90
			max = 270

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

# Fengrine
fengrine_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Fengrine"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Fengrine_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Neelanon
neelanon_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Neelanon"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Neelanon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Neelanon_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Asmeru
asmeru_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Asmeru"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Asmeru_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Asmeru_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Hestria
hestria_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Hestria"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hestria_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hestria_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_veld_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = lush_planet
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Tibrin (Cal)
tibrin_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tibrin"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tibrin_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tibrin_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_tibrin
			set_reef_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_1
			create_ishi_tib_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:ishi_tib_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = { 
				name = "NAME_Tibrin_Shoal"
				civics = { 
					civic = civic_technocracy
					civic = civic_environmentalist
				}
				authority = auth_democratic
				species = event_target:ishi_tib_species
				ethos = { 
					ethic = "ethic_egalitarian"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophile"
					ethic = "ethic_materialist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = { 
				set_graphical_culture = misc_03
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = ishi_tib_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Tibrin_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tibrin_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Rindao
rindao_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Rindao"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rindao_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rindao_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Parada
parada_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Parada"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Parada_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 6
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 6
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Knores
knores_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Knores"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Knores_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Knores_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			min = 3

			max = 25
		}

# Nars

	name = "NAME_Nars"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"

		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nars_S"

			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Nars_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}

			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Adoris
adoris_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Adoris"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Adoris_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Adoris_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Hutlar
hutlar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Hutlar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hutlar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Hutlar_P1"
		class = pc_tundra
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

	# 		}

	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable

	# 			min = 90

# Nepoy

		senex_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		name = "NAME_Nepoy_S"

		size = {

			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90

# Veron
veron_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Veron"
	class = "sc_tatooine"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Veron_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Veron_P1"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Veron_P2"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Veron_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Veron_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Veron_P3"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Veron_P4"
		class = pc_arctic
		init_effect = { set_glacial_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

# StarForge Nebula
starforge_nebula_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_StarForge_Nebula"
	class = "sc_nebula_purple"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_StarForge_Nebula_S"
		class = "pc_nebula_purple"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_purple_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

				max = 1
			}

				max = 5
			}

			}

		}

		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270

			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 90

		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shuldene_P1"
		class = pc_frozen
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_glacial
				entity = glacial_planet_01_entity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

riflor_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Riflor"
	class = "sc_riflor"
	flags = {
		cerean_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_S1"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_S2"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 15
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 40
			max = 180
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_S3"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 15
		orbit_angle = 150
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_P2"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_primal_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Riflor_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Riflor_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Riflor_P2_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Riflor_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size

# Sarrish
sarrish_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sarrish"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		koorivar_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_corellian_trade_spine
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sarrish_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sarrish_P1"
		class = pc_alpine
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_sarrish
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = extensive_moon_system
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sarrish_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sarrish_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Sarrish_P1_3"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size

# Anoat
anoat_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Anoat"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Anoat_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 35
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Anoat_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}

	}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = { 
			set_swamp_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_2
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "NAME_Anoat_P3_1"
			class = pc_savannah

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}

			name = "NAME_Anoat_P4_1"

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Anoat_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

# Varonat
varonat_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Varonat"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		javin_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Varonat_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Virgillia
virgillia_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Virgillia"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Virgillia_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Virgillia_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Virgillia_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Virgillia_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Virgillia_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			max = 15

				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Virgillia_P5"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = 10

		}

# Lipsec
lipsec_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Lipsec"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lipsec_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Lipsec_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Taul
taul_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Taul"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Taul_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Taul_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_swamp_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Dorvalla
dorvalla_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Dorvalla"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		eriadu_start_system
		canon_map
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dorvalla_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Dorvalla_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_3
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Dorvalla_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		name = "NAME_Kelrodo_Ai_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

# Mustafar
mustafar_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mustafar"
	class = "sc_k"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_hydian_way
			}
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P2"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P3"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "searing_planet_01_entity"
		init_effect = {
			set_lava_world = yes
			add_deposit = d_regional_materials
			add_deposit = d_local_power_source
			add_deposit = d_abandoned_hydroponic
			add_deposit = d_mustafar_kmc_facility
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_mustafar
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mustafar_P4_1"
			class = pc_ocean
			init_effect = { set_panthalassic_world = yes }
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mustafar_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Mustafar_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mustafar_P6"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
