			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Subterrel_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		init_effect = { set_karst_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_subterrel
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = karst
			}
		}
		entity = "toxic_planet_01_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Red Nebula
red_nebula_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Red_Nebula"
	class = "sc_nebula_red"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		amoeba_1_system
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					settings = {
						garrison = yes
					}
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						set_formation_scale = 3
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = red_nebula_system
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Red_Nebula_S"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Red_Nebula_P1"
		class = pc_savannah
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		entity = "barren_planet_mars_entity"
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_effusive_world = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_of_the_red_nebula
			create_red_humanoid_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:red_humanoid_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Crimson_Council" # TODO incorrect auth/civics combo
				civics = {
					civic = civic_imperial_cult
					civic = civic_functional_architecture
				}
				authority = auth_imperial
				species = event_target:red_humanoid_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"
					ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = red_nebula_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Red_Nebula_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
	}
}

	name = "NAME_Needan"

		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1

				max = 5

			orbit_angle = {

			}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			set_snow_world = yes
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = asteroid_impacts
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30

			min = 90

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable

				min = 90

		}

		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

				set_forest_world = yes

					name = "NAME_Ewok_Tribe"

						ethic = "ethic_fanatic_spiritualist"

					}

				}

					set_graphical_culture = misc_01
					set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
					set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
					save_global_event_target_as = ewok_faction
					capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Endor_P1_9" }
				}
				add_building = building_primitive_capital
				add_building = building_primitive_farm
				add_building = building_primitive_mine
				add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
				add_building = building_primitive_factory
				add_building = building_urban_dwellings
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Endor_P2"
		class = pc_arctic

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

	}

		bakuran_start_system
		canon_map
	}

		name = "NAME_Timora_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# O'reen
oreen_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_O_Reen"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_O_Reen_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_O_Reen_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_plateau_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_oreen
			create_oreenian_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:oreenian_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Oreenian_Dictatorship"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal
					civic = civic_warrior_culture
				}
				authority = auth_dictatorial
				species = event_target:oreenian_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = oreenian_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_O_Reen_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_O_Reen_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_O_Reen_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		name = "NAME_Jakku_S"

		orbit_angle = 1

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jakku_P1"
		class = pc_molten
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no

# Zonama Sekot
zonama_sekot_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Zonama_Sekot"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = midgame_hyper_umarenk
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zonama_Sekot_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zonama_Sekot_P1"

			max = 15
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

			max = 270

		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Zakuul_S"

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	planet = {

		}

# Belassar

	name = "NAME_Belassar"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Belassar_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Belassar_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0

			}

				max = 5

# Mondress
mondress_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mondress"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mondress_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}

		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Kril'Dor
krildor_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Kril_Dor"

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kril_Dor_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Kril_Dor_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {

		class = random_non_colonizable

			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 4

		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = no

			add_deposit = d_exotic_gases_4
		}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

			name = "NAME_Kril_Dor_P3_4"

			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

				min = 90

			}

# Sinton
sinton_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Sinton"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sinton_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Sinton_P1"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

# Utegetu Nebula
utegetu_nebula_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Utegetu_Nebula"
	class = "sc_nebula_green"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		save_global_event_target_as = unknown_regions_utegetu
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Utegetu_Nebula_S"
		class = "pc_nebula_green"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_green_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
}

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}

	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			min = 2

			min = 90
			max = 270

				max = 1

				max = 5

		}

# Volik
volik_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Volik"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Volik_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 2
	# 		max = 3
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 5
	# 		max = 10
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 1
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Volik_P1"
		class = pc_gaia
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_ancient_world = yes
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Volik_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Volik_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {

gyuel_system_initializer = {

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {

		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Gyuel_P1"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gyuel_P1_4"
			class = pc_continental
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gyuel_P1_5"
			class = pc_continental
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gyuel_P1_6"
			class = pc_continental
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Gyuel_P1_7"
			class = pc_tropical
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = smuggler_hideout
				set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
				set_forest_world = yes
			}
		}
	}

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}

		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 185
	}

		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

		class = pc_tropical

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

# Zosha
zosha_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Zosha"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Zosha_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		name = "NAME_Zosha_P1"
		class = pc_continental

		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
	}
}

			max = 270
		}

				max = 5
			}

				min = 90
				max = 270

			orbit_distance = 2
		}

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}

			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}

# Vagar Praxut

	name = "NAME_Vagar_Praxut"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vagar_Praxut_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Vagar_Praxut_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_vagar_praxut
			add_modifier = { modifier = natural_beauty }
			create_vagaari_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:vagaari_species" AMOUNT = 12 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Vagaari_Empire"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal #need to change
					civic = civic_mining_guilds #need to change
				}
				authority = auth_imperial
				species = event_target:vagaari_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_authoritarian"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
					ethic = "ethic_militarist"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_04
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = vagaari_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Vagar_Praxut_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}

	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}

	# 		}

	# 		}

	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}

	# 	}
	# }

		class = random_asteroid

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = unknown_regions_ilum
	}

		name = "NAME_Ilum_S"
		class = star

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

				min = 90

# Crustai
crustai_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Crustai"
	class = "sc_f"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		elite_system
		crystal_home_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = yes
			}
			event_target:crystal_country = {
				save_event_target_as = elite1_owner
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
							design = "NAME_Crystal_Nidus"
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 0
						}
						#set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						#set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						#set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ruby_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 5
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 9
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 19
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 72
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Topaz_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 14
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 144
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 20
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 216
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Emerald_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 288
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crustai_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crustai_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crustai_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crustai_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crustai_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crustai_P2_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crustai_P2_3"

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crustai_P3"
		class = pc_arctic
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_glacial_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crustai_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 40
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crustai_P4_1"

				min = 90

			}

# Schesa
schesa_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Schesa"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Schesa_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

			min = 2
			max = 3
		}

			min = 5
			max = 10

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {

		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no

	}

			max = 4

			max = 25

# Exegol
exegol_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Exegol"
	class = "sc_a"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Exegol_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Exegol_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 120
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_exegol
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = wild_storms
			}
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_exegol
			}
			add_deposit = d_exegol_citadel
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
}

		canon_map
	}

		}
	}

			max = 35
		}

			min = 0
			max = 1
		}
		size = {

			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_iceberg_world = yes
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = ocean_dac_planet_01_entity
			}
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 2
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

		canon_map
	}

		}

		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhigar_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhigar_P3"
		class = pc_arctic
		init_effect = { set_frigid_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhigar_P3_1"
			class = pc_tropical
			init_effect = { set_forest_world = yes }
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Rhigar_P3_2"
			class = pc_barren_cold
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {

# Colonial Station Chaf
colonial_station_chaf_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Colonial_Station_Chaf"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Colonial_Station_Chaf_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Colonial_Station_Chaf_P1"
		class = pc_deep_space_station
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @habitat_min_size
			max = @habitat_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_entity = {
				entity = "habitat_phase_01_entity"
				#graphical_culture = imperial_01
			}
			set_planet_flag = megastructure
			set_planet_flag = deep_space_station
			set_planet_flag = habitat
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

		}
		modifiers = none

	}

# Crakull
crakull_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Crakull"
	class = "sc_g"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		drone_destroyer_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
			}
			set_deposit = d_minerals_8
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_P1"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crakull_P2_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_P3"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crakull_P3_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_P4"
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crakull_P5"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crakull_P5_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Crakull_P5_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2

			}
		}

jedha_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Jedha"
	class = "sc_k"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jedha_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Jedha_P1"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 120
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		entity = "swp_barren_planet_03_entity"
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = planet_jedha
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Jedha_P1_1"
			class = pc_desert
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
			init_effect = {
				set_planet_flag = planet_jedha_moon
				add_deposit = d_kyber_vein
				add_deposit = d_jedha_jedha_city
			}
		}
	}
}

			max = 10

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Shihon_P1"
		class = pc_ocean
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270

			max = 10

		}
	}

# 244Core
244core_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_244Core"
	class = "sc_m"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_244Core_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_244Core_P1"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 80
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		modifiers = none
		has_ring = yes
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_ash_world = yes
			add_modifier = { modifier = high_gravity }
			add_modifier = { modifier = mineral_rich }
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_244Core_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_244Core_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# Tenupe
tenupe_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tenupe"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = unknown_regions_tenupe
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tenupe_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tenupe_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		init_effect = { set_jungle_world = yes }
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tenupe_P1_1"
			class = pc_broken
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 4
				max = 6
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

# Plunder Moon
plunder_moon_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Plunder_Moon"
	class = "sc_black_hole"
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_leviathans = yes
			}
			set_star_flag = guardians_horror_system
			set_star_flag = guardian
			set_star_flag = hostile_system
		}
	}
	asteroid_belt = {
		type = rocky_asteroid_belt
		radius = 180
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Plunder_Moon_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Plunder_Moon_P1"
		class = pc_barren_cold
		orbit_distance = 100
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Plunder_Moon_P1_1"
			class = pc_arctic
			init_effect = { set_geothermal_world = yes }
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = @moon_planet_min_size
				max = @moon_planet_max_size
			}
		}
	}
}

# Altiria-Anarris
altiria_anarris_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = @capital_size
		has_ring = no
		deposit_blockers = none
		modifiers = none
		init_effect = {
			prevent_anomaly = yes
			set_supercontinental_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = planet_altiria_anarris
			create_altiri_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:altiri_species" AMOUNT = 6 }
			create_anarrian_species = yes
			generate_pops = { SPECIES = "event_target:anarrian_species" AMOUNT = 6 }
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Altiri_Anarrian_Duopoly"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_nationalistic_zeal
					civic = civic_shadow_council
				}
				authority = auth_dictatorial
				species = event_target:altiri_species
				ethos = {
					ethic = "ethic_fanatic_militarist"
					ethic = "ethic_xenophobe"
				}
				type = primitive
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_graphical_culture = misc_01
				set_country_flag = sw_minor_faction
				set_pre_ftl_age = sw_minor_faction
				save_global_event_target_as = altiri_anarrian_faction
				capital_scope = { set_name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris_P1" }
			}
			add_building = building_primitive_capital
			add_building = building_primitive_farm
			add_building = building_primitive_mine
			add_building = building_primitive_power_plant
			add_building = building_primitive_factory
			add_building = building_urban_dwellings
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris_P1_1"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 40
				max = 180
			}
			size = {
				min = 3
				max = 3
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Altiria_Anarris_P1_2"
			class = pc_barren
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = 120
			size = {
				min = 5
				max = 5
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 3
			max = 4
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

		}

		}

		}

		}
	}

	planet = {

# Mugg Fallow
mugg_fallow_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Mugg_Fallow"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Mugg_Fallow_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1

				max = 5
			}

				min = 90

			min = 90
			max = 270
		}

			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {

				max = 5

		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}

# Primea
primea_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Primea"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	class = "sc_g"
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Primea_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Primea_P1"
		class = pc_toxic
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist

			name = "NAME_Primea_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Primea_P2"
		class = pc_desert
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size

			set_oasis_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Primea_P3"
		class = pc_barren
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = yes
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Primea_P4"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}

			name = "NAME_Primea_P4_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Primea_P4_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {

			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90

			min = 90

	# 		}

	# 	}
	# }

				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Persappa_P1"
		class = pc_tropical
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @small_planet_min_size
			max = @small_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_bog_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25

# Tulpaa
tulpaa_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Tulpaa"
	class = "sc_k"
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tulpaa_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1"
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1_1"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1_2"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1_3"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1_4"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
		moon = {
			name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P1_5"
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_distance = 2
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 4
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P2"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P3"
		class = pc_arid
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
			set_aeolian_world = yes
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Tulpaa_P4"
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = 10
			max = 15

# Perann Nebula
perann_nebula_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Perann_Nebula"
	class = "sc_nebula_red"
	flags = {
		hostile_system
		amoeba_1_system
		nebula_system
	}
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					settings = {
						garrison = yes
					}
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Zebra"
							}
						}
						set_formation_scale = 3
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Perann_Nebula_S"
		class = "pc_nebula_red"
		orbit_distance = 1
		size = 1
		init_effect = {
			create_p_red_space = yes
			prevent_anomaly = yes
		}
	}
	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		class = pc_ice_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 130
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = 3
	}
}

# Rhand
rhand_system_initializer = {
	name = "NAME_Rhand"
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	flags = {
		nebula_system
	}

			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}

			min = 30
			max = 35
		}

		count = {
			min = 2
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 10
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Rhand_P1"
		class = pc_continental
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		init_effect = {
			set_prairie_world = yes
			set_planet_flag = sw_habitable_4
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	}
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 3
	# 		max = 4
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 10
	# 		max = 25
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 2
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }
}

####### BEGIN MODIFIER FILLER SYSTEMS ####### 
## Defunct

unknown_regions_system_initializer = {
	class = "rl_varied_stars" #Real funky
	
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_unknown_regions
		}
	}
	
	planet = {
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 20
			max = 40
		}
	}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 25
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 2
			}
			size = {
				min = 1
				max = 6
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

	planet = {
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 2
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			orbit_angle = { min = 90 max = 270 }
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
	
	planet = {
		count = { min = 0 max = 2 }
		orbit_distance = 60
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_angle = { min = 90 max = 270 }
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 35
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 4
			}
			size = {
				min = 1
				max = 7
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}

#Still useful
crait_system_initializer = {
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	name = "NAME_Crait"
	
	init_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = large_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = medium_map_spawned
					has_global_flag = small_map_spawned
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
			}
		}
	}
	
	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crait_S"
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	# planet = {
	# 	count = {
	# 		min = 1
	# 		max = 1
	# 	}
	# 	size = {
	# 		min = 5
	# 		max = 15
	# 	}
	# 	class = random_non_colonizable
	# 	orbit_distance = 30
	# 	orbit_angle = {
	# 		min = 90
	# 		max = 270
	# 	}
	# 	change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
	# 	moon = {
	# 		count = {
	# 			min = 0
	# 			max = 1
	# 		}
	# 		size = {
	# 			min = 2
	# 			max = 5
	# 		}
	# 		class = random_non_colonizable
	# 		orbit_angle = {
	# 			min = 90
	# 			max = 270
	# 		}
	# 		orbit_distance = 2
	# 	}
	# }

	planet = {
		name = "NAME_Crait_P1"
		class = pc_desert
		init_effect = { 
			set_salt_world = yes
			set_planet_entity = {
				picture = pc_crait
			}
			
		}
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		# change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		# moon = {
		# 	count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
		# 	orbit_angle = { min = 90 max = 270 }
		# 	orbit_distance = 5
		# }
	}
	
}

roon_system_initializer = {
	class = "rl_standard_stars"
	
	init_effect = {
		add_modifier = {
			modifier = sy_triellus_trade_route
		}
	}
	
	planet = {
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		size = {
			min = 30
			max = 35
		}
	}

	change_orbit = @base_planet_dist
	planet = {
		count = {
			min = 0
			max = 3
		}
		size = {
			min = 5
			max = 15
		}
		class = random_non_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 1
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}

	planet = {
		class = swnd_random_colonizable
		orbit_distance = 30
		orbit_angle = {
			min = 90
			max = 270
		}
		count = {
			min = 1
			max = 1
		}
		size = {
			min = @medium_planet_min_size
			max = @medium_planet_max_size
		}
		has_ring = no
		change_orbit = @base_moon_dist
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			orbit_angle = { min = 90 max = 270 }
			orbit_distance = 5
		}
	}
	
	planet = {
		count = { min = 0 max = 2 }
		orbit_distance = 60
		class = pc_gas_giant
		orbit_angle = { min = 90 max = 270 }
		size = {
			min = 25
			max = 30
		}

		change_orbit = @base_moon_distance
		moon = {
			count = {
				min = 0
				max = 3
			}
			size = {
				min = 2
				max = 5
			}
			class = random_non_colonizable
			orbit_angle = {
				min = 90
				max = 270
			}
			orbit_distance = 2
		}
	}
}
